heroSlides.caption: Court Hire
heroSlides.description: Welcome to Brisbane Badminton — Brisbane’s premier purpose-built badminton centre.

heroSlides.caption: Academy
heroSlides.description: The Brisbane Badminton Academy is one of Queensland’s leading training programs, catering to players of all ages and levels — from complete beginners to elite athletes.

heroSlides.caption: Social
heroSlides.description: Join our daily social badminton sessions — open to players of all ages and skill levels. No partner required, just turn up and play.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Brisbane Badminton is Queensland’s first purpose-built badminton facility, offering state-of-the-art amenities and international-standard courts. We are certified to host BWF international tournaments and QBA state tournaments.

features.title: Premium Courts
features.description: 9 world-class courts with premium cushioned flooring, international-standard lighting, and extra-high ceilings designed for professional play.

features.title: Expert Coaching
features.description: The Brisbane Badminton Academy offers structured programs for kids, adults, and elite players, led by qualified and accredited coaches.

features.title: Community Events
features.description: We host cultural, community, and social sporting events, fostering an inclusive and vibrant badminton community.

services.title: Court Hire
services.description_disabled: 9 fully-lit, soft flooring, high ceiling badminton courts available for hire to both members and non-members for all 7 days a week throughout the year.

services.title: QBA Membership
services.description_disalbled: South Brisbane Badminton Inc. club is a fully incorporated not-for-profit association, officially registered under Badminton Australia and the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA) with over 150 active club members.
keyFeatures: Officially registered under Badminton Australia and the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA).

services.title: Restringing
services.descriptionOLD: Top-quality restringing service with fast turnaround. We use premium strings and professional techniques to ensure your racket performs at its best. Our experts can advise on string tension and type for your playing style. Drop off your racket and pick it up ready for your next match!
services.description_disabled: Fast, professional restringing service for all racket types
keyFeatures: Expert advice on string tension and type

services.title: Personal Training
services.description_disabled: Personal coaching sessions tailored to your skill level. Our certified coaches focus on technique, strategy, and fitness.

services.title: Social
services.description_disabled: Hosting regular social play sessions fostering community engagement and active participation for all age groups.
keyFeatures: Active participation for all age groups

services.title: Academy
services.description_disabled: Our academy operates as both a community sports provider and an elite junior athlete development centre with over 150 active members.

info.title: Court Hire Information
info.description: Book our Brisbane highest ceiling badminton courts today and take your game to the next level!
features: High-quality indoor courts with professional flooring and lighting.
Courts are badminton shoes only for safety and surface protection.
Hire court to play with friends or organizing your socials.
Courts can be booked online and offline at the center.
If you don't have badminton shoes, you can buy a pair at our pro shop located at the badminton center.
Available for singles, doubles, and group bookings.
Free parking and easy access from major roads.
Refreshments and equipment available at our pro shop.
Special rates for club members and regular players.
notes: Whether you're practicing, playing a friendly match, or hosting a tournament, our courts provide the perfect environment for all skill levels.
For group bookings, events, or regular sessions, please contact our team for custom packages and support.

terms: All players must use only BADMINTON SHOES or Non marking shoes at Brisbane Badminton.
People wearing shoes with black sole/bottom (including partially black) will not be allowed to play on our courts (no refunds of court booking).
People wearing any other shoes which can make any colored marks (including white marks) on the mats will not be allowed to play on our courts.
If you are unsure about your shoes, they are most likely Marking Shoes.
Any breach of this rule will incur management fee start from $150 (Must pay before leaving the Center).

Court Arrangements: Please note that courts for your booking may be adjusted for better utilisation of the facility. You'll be notified through the booking system if there are any changes. Kindly check your booking again on the day. If you do not wish to be moved, please notify us through the comment section upon making your bookings.
All customers are obligated to step off the court at the end of your booking hours; Any extended time of using the court may be charged.
Please read our Booking Rules including Cancellation Policy.
No Outside coaches are allowed to do any sort of coaching in Brisbane Badminton premises.

heroSlides.caption: Academy – Train Smarter. Play Better.
heroSlides.description: designed for every player, from beginners to elite athletes. Our programs are run by certified coaches with years of experience, helping you improve your skills, fitness, and confidence on court.

about.title: About the Club
about.description: Brisbane Badminton is home to South Brisbane Badminton Inc., a fully incorporated, not-for-profit badminton club. The club is officially registered with Badminton Australia and the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA), and has over 150 active members. It runs competitions, represents players at state and national levels, and fosters the growth of badminton within Brisbane’s southside community.

qba.title: QBA Membership
qba.description: South Brisbane Badminton Inc. is proud to be affiliated with the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA). Becoming a QBA member not only supports the growth of badminton in Queensland but also allows you to compete in official state-level tournaments and includes insurance coverage during these competitions.
qba.courtDescription: Play on our badminton courts, featuring the highest ceiling in Queensland, soft cushion flooring, and the brightest lights for unmatched comfort, performance, and safety. With top-tier flooring, professional lighting, and quality equipment, our facility offers the perfect environment for both casual play and serious training.
qba.bookingNote: Reserve your court online for a smooth, hassle-free experience. Whether you're training, competing, or just having fun—South Brisbane Badminton Inc. is the place to be.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
items: All players must use only BADMINTON SHOES or Non marking shoes at Brisbane Badminton.
People wearing shoes with black sole/bottom (including partially black) will not be allowed to play on our courts (no refunds of court booking).
People wearing any other shoes which can make any colored marks (including white marks) on the mats will not be allowed to play on our courts.
If you are unsure about your shoes, they are most likely Marking Shoes.
Any breach of this rule will incur management fee start from $150 (Must pay before leaving the Center).

Court Arrangements: Please note that courts for your booking may be adjusted for better utilisation of the facility. You'll be notified through the booking system if there are any changes. Kindly check your booking again on the day. If you do not wish to be moved, please notify us through the comment section upon making your bookings.
All customers are obligated to step off the court at the end of your booking hours; Any extended time of using the court may be charged.
Please read our Booking Rules including Cancellation Policy.
No Outside coaches are allowed to do any sort of coaching in Brisbane Badminton premises.

facilities.title: Indoor Courts
facilities.description: Play in our state-of-the-art indoor courts, designed for the best badminton experience.

facilities.title: QBA Club Members
facilities.description: Join our vibrant community of badminton enthusiasts and make new friends. Club memberships are open for all skill levels. Just $99 per year. Contact us to join and enjoy exclusive member benefits, priority court bookings, and access to club tournaments and socials.

facilities.title: Pro Shop
facilities.description: Get all your badminton gear and accessories from our well-stocked pro shop. We offer rackets, shoes, shuttlecocks, apparel, and expert advice for players of all levels.

benefits: Ability to participate in all sanctioned tournaments and regional affiliated club activities
Insurance coverage for injuries occurring at QBA sanctioned tournaments and affiliated clubs
Priority access to special opportunities involving international tournaments, coaching seminars and social events hosted by the QBA
Opportunity to represent Queensland in national competitions at junior and senior levels

events.title: Academy Tournament
events.description: Join our academy tournament to test your skills against fellow players. Open to all academy members, this event is a great opportunity to showcase your progress and compete in a friendly environment. Prizes for winners!

events.title: Social
events.description: A casual meet-up for members to socialize, play badminton, and have fun. Enjoy refreshments, friendly matches, and networking opportunities in a relaxed setting.

socials.title: Badminton Night
socials.description: Join us for a casual night of badminton! Meet new people, play friendly matches, and enjoy snacks and drinks.

socials.title: Adult Socials
socials.description: A charity event to raise funds for local youth badminton programs. Compete and contribute to a good cause!

socials.title: Kids Socials
socials.description: A day for the entire family! Come for a friendly tournament, activities for all ages, and delicious food and beverages.

socials.title: Family Fun Day
socials.description: A day of fun for the whole family! Enjoy badminton games, food stalls, and activities for kids.

socials.title: Charity Tournament
socials.description: A charity event to raise funds for local youth badminton programs. Compete and contribute to a good cause!

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Brisbane Badminton?
points: Tournament certified by the Badminton World Federation (BWF)
Professional coaching academy for all ages
Daily social play sessions, no partner required
Affordable court hire with unbeatable member discounts
Blue Card verified and PlayOn registered provider
Onsite Pro Shop and professional restringing service

acceptedAnswer.text: 39 Quilton Place, Crestmead QLD — easy access for Brisbane’s southside and Logan.

mainEntity.name: Do I need a partner for social badminton?

acceptedAnswer.text: No. Just turn up — we’ll match you on arrival by skill level.

mainEntity.name: How do I book a court?

acceptedAnswer.text: Book online via our website any time. Walk-ins welcome when courts are free.
Yes — certified coaches for juniors, adults, and performance players (groups and privates).
Yes — our purpose-built venue is approved for state, national, and international events.
Yes — free onsite parking for all visitors.

mainEntity.name: Can I hire or buy equipment?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — on-site Pro Shop plus racquet hire and shuttle sales.
Yes — fast, professional restringing for all racquet types.
Indoor court shoes (non-marking) and comfortable sportswear.
Yes — beginner to advanced pathways through our Brisbane Badminton Academy.
No membership required. Pay-as-you-play, with packages available.

mainEntity.name: Can schools or groups hire the venue?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely — we host school programs, team-building, and private events.

hero.title: About Brisbane Badminton
hero.description:
Brisbane Badminton is Queensland’s first purpose-built badminton facility, offering state-of-the-art amenities and international-standard courts. We are certified to host BWF international tournaments and QBA state tournaments. Our community includes more than 200 active members and trainees. We are the training base for the Queensland Junior State Team and a hub for cultural, community, and social sporting events. 


 We believe in making badminton accessible, safe, and enjoyable for all players — from casual participants to professional athletes.

sections.title: Why Choose Brisbane Badminton?
Points: - Tournament certified by the Badminton World Federation (BWF)
- Professional coaching academy for all ages
- Daily social play sessions, no partner required
- Affordable court hire with unbeatable member discounts
- Blue Card verified and PlayOn registered provider
- Onsite Pro Shop and professional restringing service

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: Address: 39 Quilton Place, Crestmead QLD Bookings: badmintonbrisbane.yepbooking.com.au Email: admin@badmintonbrisbane.com.au

acheivements: 2021 City of Brisbane Champion AMS Champion
